item.title: Why Move Beyond Misinformation?
item.description: In a bit of great news, I’ve been invited to present our paper on ["Paths to Power"](/projects/paths-to-power/ at the upcoming workshop “Beyond Misinformation: Towards a Research Agenda for Information Ecosystems, Network Dynamics and Emergent Epistemologies” 1 hosted by the iSchool at Syracuse University.
